job_title: C#/.NET Developer - Multiple New Programs of Work
job_purpose: To contribute to a brand new multi-million dollar program of work impacting millions of customers for Australia's most loved brand.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop and maintain applications using C# and .NET technologies
Design and implement APIs for seamless integration
Architect and develop microservices within a distributed architecture
Implement CI/CD pipelines for efficient software delivery
Utilize Azure services for cloud-based solutions
Collaborate with teams to integrate React components
required_qualifications: Experience in API development and microservices architecture
Familiarity with React for front-end development
company_details: Australia's most loved brand is experiencing unprecedented success and growth, offering a dynamic work environment with opportunities for long-term extensions or permanency. The headquarters is located in Perth, with a flexible hybrid office/remote work arrangement.
